comments:

RuntimeException for both GTK and Motif versions.

I am attaching the output log files for both motif and gtk. The JDK version is I
am using is 1.4.2_05.

Please let me know, if any other details needed, I can provide.

Did you download the complete SDK or the RCP SDK?

How did you install Eclipse? Did you unzip it overtop an existing install or did
you install it to a new directory?

I had created and unzipped into new directories. Here is name and size of the
files I have used before.

-rw-------  1 ramana ramana  4911893 Aug  1 18:09 eclipse-RCP-3.0-linux-gtk.zip
-rw-------  1 ramana ramana 19191310 Aug  1 18:39
eclipse-RCP-SDK-3.0-linux-motif.zip

Today I had downloaded this, its works now.
-rw-------  1 ramana ramana 89113015 Aug  4 22:58 eclipse-SDK-3.0-linux-gtk.zip

Ok, that makes sense. The RCP SDK is intended to be used as a target. It does
not contain an application...you must create one to use with it.

I believe the intention is to use the regular SDK (the second file you
downloaded) as your development environment, and to set up the RCP SDK as your
target environment.

traces.message: No application id has been found.
No application id has been found.
